snippet: Wei-Yin Chen scattered seven hits over seven innings Wednesday and the Baltimore Orioles set a franchise record with their seventh straight victory in Boston, beating the Red Sox, 2-1.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Eileen McNamee, the soon-to-be-ex-wife of former trainer Brian McNamee, contradicts her husband's testimony at Roger Clemens perjury trial; denies that he told her about injecting Clemens with performance-enhancing drugs; baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Wei-Yin Chen scattered seven hits over seven innings Wednesday and the Baltimore Orioles set a franchise record with their seventh straight victory in Boston, beating the Red Sox, 2-1.

headline.seo: Clemens Trial — McNamee’s Wife Contradicts His Testimony
headline.main: McNamee’s Testimony at Clemens Trial Is Contradicted by His Wife
headline.print_headline: McNamee’s Testimony at Clemens Trial Is Contradicted by His Wife
